subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Paul Menard won the pole, covering the 2.5 miles with a fast lap of 185.916 miles an hour to finish just ahead of his teammate Mark Martin, and Dale Earnhart Inc. swept the front row in qualifying for Saturday night’s Coke Zero 400.
snippet: Paul Menard won the pole, covering the 2.5 miles with a fast lap of 185.916 miles an hour to finish just ahead of his teammate Mark Martin, and Dale Earnhart Inc. swept the front row in qualifying for Saturday night’s Coke Zero 400.
